message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the effects of a storm. After a storm, a glass vial with markings on it can tell how wet an area got by measuring the amount of rainfall that occurred. Option (A) is incorrect because the glass vial has no way of measuring the loudness of a baby. Option (C) is unrelated as the glass vial cannot measure the emotions of a puppy. Option (D) is also unrelated as it cannot measure how bad a skunk smells.
